examples.example: 他抱着一捆鲜花，准备去送给心爱的人。

translate.english: He is holding a bunch of fresh flowers and is going to give them to his beloved.

examples.example: 农民伯伯收获了一捆捆金黄的稻穗，脸上洋溢着喜悦的笑容。

translate.english: Uncle farmers harvested bundles of golden rice ears, with joyous smiles on their faces.

examples.example: 我买了一捆气球，准备用来装饰房间，让房间充满欢乐的氛围。

translate.english: I bought a bunch of balloons and prepared to use them to decorate the room to make the room full of a joyful atmosphere.
